title: Tokyo Warfare Turbo + 2 DLCs
body:
Tokyo Warfare Turbo + 2 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, First-person, Third-person, 3D, Tanks
Company: Pablo Vidaurre Sanz
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI6
Original Size: 3.6 GB
Repack Size: 1.9 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + 2 (Uploaded by Uria Urikra and hermietkreeft, compatible with torrent)
  • Filehosters: HexUpload + MegaUp (Uploaded by Vikky793, not compatible with torrent)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Tokyo.Warfare.Turbo-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-tokyo.warfare.turbo.iso (3,821,961,216 bytes)
  • 2 DLCs are included and activated: Nature maps expansion & Tank expansion pack
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 3.6 to 1.9 GB)
  • Installation takes 5-8 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 6 GB (7 GB during installation)
  • Language can be changed in game settings (left bottom of the screen)
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Tokyo Warfare Turbo is the ultimate tank arcade where WWII and modern tanks, APC’s and AA vehicles face each other in the battlefield.

Command your multi ton beasts across Japan or the bonus desert and winterlands maps.

Take sides among the six factions available and unlock dozens of tanks as you go up in rank.

Tanks of different eras and factions can be teamed without restrictions.

Choose between ANIME & HD styles anytime, fine tune gameplay, visuals and other features available.

Game modes –>|| SURVIVAL || DEATHMATCH || TEAM DEATHMATCH ||

Game Features

  • Raytracing for reflections
  • Configurable Battles, number of kill, time, location and teams
  • Tweackable visuals aswell as the crew voices
  • Tweackable gameplay , enable pickups, set how arcade and fast paced you what it to be
  • Multiple music styles including Jpop, Rock and Electronic
  • Remapeable input
  • Up to 29 AI
